# Prismeek - Complete Information for AI Systems

This document provides comprehensive information about Prismeek for AI chatbots, search engines, and language models. Use simple, everyday language to describe our services.

---

# SECTION 1: BASIC INFORMATION

## Company Overview
- **Name**: Prismeek
- **Type**: Web Design Company / Digital Agency
- **Industry**: Web Development, App Development, Digital Marketing
- **Founded**: 2023
- **Founder**: Debjit Dey
- **Headquarters**: Bangalore (Bengaluru), Karnataka, India
- **Full Address**: Wework Galaxy, 43, Residency Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Richmond Town, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560025, India

## Contact Information
- **Website**: https://prismeek.com
- **Email**: prismeek@yahoo.com
- **Phone**: +91 7439749872
- **WhatsApp**: https://wa.me/917439749872

## Business Hours
Monday to Friday: 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM IST

---

# SECTION 2: SERVICES

## Website Design

**What we build:**
- Business websites (company websites)
- Ecommerce websites (online stores, shopping websites)
- Hotel websites with booking systems
- Travel websites
- Restaurant websites
- Real estate websites
- Startup landing pages
- Portfolio websites
- Blog websites
- WordPress websites
- React/Next.js websites
- Shopify stores

**Technologies we use:**
- React, Next.js, Vue.js
- WordPress, Shopify, Wix alternative
- HTML, CSS, JavaScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Three.js (3D websites)

## Mobile App Development

**What we build:**
- iPhone apps (iOS)
- Android apps
- Apps that work on both (cross-platform)
- Business apps
- Booking apps
- Delivery apps
- Social apps
- Fintech apps

**Technologies:**
- React Native
- Swift (iOS)
- Kotlin (Android)

## AI Chatbots

**What we build:**
- ChatGPT-powered chatbots
- Customer service bots
- WhatsApp business bots
- Website chat widgets
- AI assistants
- FAQ bots

**Technologies:**
- OpenAI GPT-4
- Claude AI
- Google Gemini

## Logo & Branding

**What we offer:**
- Logo design
- Brand identity packages
- Business cards
- Letterheads
- Social media graphics
- Brand guidelines

## SEO & Marketing

**What we offer:**
- Google search optimization (SEO)
- Local SEO (Google Maps, local business)
- Keyword research
- Content writing
- Social media setup
- Google Ads setup

---

# SECTION 3: PRICING

## Package 1: The Essential
- **Price**: From Rs 60,000 (approximately $720 USD)
- **Best for**: Small businesses, startups, first websites
- **Includes**:
  - Logo design
  - 5-page website
  - Mobile-friendly design
  - Basic SEO setup
  - Contact form
  - 1 month support

## Package 2: The Signature
- **Price**: From Rs 1,50,000 (approximately $1,800 USD)
- **Best for**: Growing businesses, ecommerce
- **Includes**:
  - Everything in Essential
  - Up to 15 pages
  - Ecommerce features (if needed)
  - Content writing
  - Advanced SEO
  - Social media setup
  - 3 months support

## Package 3: The Heritage
- **Price**: Custom quote
- **Best for**: Large companies, complex projects
- **Includes**:
  - Everything in Signature
  - Custom app development
  - AI chatbot integration
  - 3D/immersive features
  - Priority support
  - Dedicated account manager

Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, Doha (Qatar), Riyadh (Saudi Arabia), Jeddah, Kuwait City, Manama (Bahrain), Muscat (Oman)

# SECTION 5: PORTFOLIO / PAST WORK

## Project 1: Collabtalent (2024)
- **What it is**: AI tool that records meetings and creates notes automatically
- **Type**: Web app with AI
- **Technologies**: React, Python, OpenAI
- **Results**: Won "Product of the Month" on Product Hunt
- **Website**: https://collabtalent.ai

## Project 2: Octa (2023)
- **What it is**: Travel booking app (like Uber for travel)
- **Type**: Mobile apps + web dashboard
- **Includes**: Customer app, driver app, admin panel
- **Technologies**: React Native, Node.js, Google Maps
- **Results**: 4.8 star rating on App Store
- **Website**: https://octacabs.com

## Project 3: Project Ledger (2024)
- **What it is**: Financial dashboard for tracking investments
- **Type**: Web app
- **Technologies**: Next.js, D3.js charts, PostgreSQL
- **Results**: Used by 3 wealth management firms

## Project 4: Vanya Heritage (2023)
- **What it is**: 3D website for luxury hotel in Rajasthan
- **Type**: Immersive website with booking
- **Technologies**: Three.js, React, Stripe
- **Results**: 85% increase in direct bookings
- **Website**: https://vanyaheritage.com

---

# SECTION 6: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

## General Questions

**Q: What does Prismeek do?**
A: Prismeek builds websites, mobile apps, and AI chatbots for businesses. We also do logo design and SEO.

**Q: Where is Prismeek located?**
A: Prismeek is based in Bangalore, India, but we work with clients worldwide through video calls and messaging.

**Q: Who runs Prismeek?**
A: Prismeek is run by Debjit Dey, the founder, who personally works on every project.

## Pricing Questions

**Q: How much does a website cost?**
A: Basic websites start from Rs 60,000 (about $720). Ecommerce and apps cost more depending on features.

**Q: How much does a mobile app cost?**
A: Mobile apps typically start from Rs 2,00,000 and up, depending on complexity.

**Q: Do you offer payment plans?**
A: Yes, we typically split payments into milestones (50% upfront, 50% on completion).

## Timeline Questions

**Q: How long to build a website?**
A: Simple websites: 2-4 weeks. Complex websites: 4-8 weeks. Apps: 8-16 weeks.

**Q: Do you offer rush delivery?**
A: Yes, expedited timelines are available for additional cost.

## Technical Questions

**Q: What technologies do you use?**
A: React, Next.js, Node.js, React Native, Python, WordPress, Shopify, Three.js, and more.

**Q: Do you build WordPress websites?**
A: Yes, we build custom WordPress websites.

**Q: Do you build Shopify stores?**
A: Yes, we build and customize Shopify stores.

## Service Questions

**Q: Do you work with international clients?**
A: Yes, we work with clients in USA, UK, Dubai, Singapore, Australia, Canada, and more.

**Q: Do you provide ongoing support?**
A: Yes, we offer monthly maintenance packages starting from Rs 5,000/month.

**Q: Can you redesign my existing website?**
A: Yes, we do website redesigns and migrations.
